mr:invisibility_buff

Entity Information

  • Class Name: Invisibility.java
  • Entity Kind: Invisibility
  • Type: Buff
  • Category: Positive

Statistics

  • Default Duration: 15f time units (defined as DURATION constant)
  • Stacking: Does not stack
  • Visual Effect: Character becomes semi-transparent (CharSprite.State.INVISIBLE)

Special Abilities

  • Stealth: Prevents enemies from actively targeting the character (increases target.invisible counter while active).
  • Attack Breaking: Ends when the character performs hostile actions.
  • Damage Over Time: Does not end when taking damage.
  • Detection: Can be detected by special means.
  • Dispelling: Can be removed by dispel function which also affects related “Cloak” buff if target has visible enemies.

Code References

  • Invisibility.java
  • Buff.java
  • FlavourBuff.java

String Resources

  • Char_StaInvisible

Configuration Files

  • No specific configuration file (uses Java defaults)

Lua Scripts

  • No specific Lua script for this buff (uses Java implementation)
rpd, buffs, machine readable
